item.title: Should I get the World of Hyatt Credit Card or transfer points from Chase instead?
item.description: Earn free Hyatt stays with the hotel chain's cobranded card, or transfer Ultimate Rewards to the World of Hyatt program for redemption. Which is best?

item.title: JetBlue to launch 2 new Fort Lauderdale routes, bring back 2 more
item.description: JetBlue is bringing back more flights in Fort Lauderdale, announcing plans Wednesday for 4 routes out of the airport, including two it previously cut.

item.title: The ultimate guide to Paul Gauguin Cruises, the French Polynesia cruise specialist
item.description: The one-ship cruise line is a leader in voyages to iconic South Pacific islands such as Tahiti, Bora Bora and Moorea.
